# Arcane Sensitivity (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Shining South (WotC), pg. 44

With a touch, you instantly determine if a creature can cast arcane spells and the maximum spell level it can cast.

**GM Note**

This spell is especially effective when combined with the *[[Spectral Hand (Spell)|spectral hand]]* spell.

*House Rule: Arcane sensitivity* can be made permanent using a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.
